001package edu.cnm.deepdive.sereknitty.adapter;
002
003import android.content.Context;
004import android.graphics.drawable.Drawable;
005import android.view.LayoutInflater;
006import android.view.View;
007import android.view.ViewGroup;
008import android.widget.Adapter;
009import android.widget.ArrayAdapter;
010import androidx.annotation.NonNull;
011import androidx.annotation.Nullable;
012import androidx.core.content.ContextCompat;
013import edu.cnm.deepdive.sereknitty.R;
014import edu.cnm.deepdive.sereknitty.controller.PatternReaderFragment;
015import edu.cnm.deepdive.sereknitty.databinding.ItemStitchesBinding;
016import edu.cnm.deepdive.sereknitty.model.Stitch;
017import edu.cnm.deepdive.sereknitty.model.entity.RowStitch;
018import java.util.Arrays;
019import java.util.List;
020
021/**
022 * This {@link Adapter} is the joining element between the data and the view model. This class links
023 * {@link Stitch} to the view model dealing with {@link PatternReaderFragment}.
024 */
025public class StitchesAdapter extends ArrayAdapter<RowStitch> {
026
027  private final LayoutInflater inflater;
028  private final Drawable[] drawables;
029
030  /**
031   * This constructor inflates the layout for the individual stitches that will show in
032   * {@link PatternReaderFragment}.
033   *
034   * @param context  {@link Context} is the global information from the activity that allows us to
035   *                 share information across multiple fragments
036   * @param stitches {@link List} of {@link RowStitch} objects that link to the {@link Enum}
037   *                 {@link Stitch}
038   */
039  public StitchesAdapter(@NonNull Context context, @NonNull List<RowStitch> stitches) {
040    super(context, R.layout.item_stitches, stitches);
041    inflater = LayoutInflater.from(context);
042    drawables = Arrays.stream(Stitch.values())
043        .map((stitch) -> ContextCompat.getDrawable(context, stitch.getImage()))
044        .toArray(Drawable[]::new);
045  }
046
047  @NonNull
048  @Override
049  public View getView(int position, @Nullable View convertView, @NonNull ViewGroup parent) {
050    RowStitch stitch = getItem(position);
051    ItemStitchesBinding binding = (convertView != null)
052        ? ItemStitchesBinding.bind(convertView)
053        : ItemStitchesBinding.inflate(inflater, parent, false);
054    binding.getRoot().setImageDrawable(drawables[stitch.getOrdinalPosition()]);
055    return binding.getRoot();
056  }
057
058}
